translation.белорусский фотограф, издатель, дизайнер: Belarusian photographer, publisher, designer, journalist, director, candidate of economic sciences. Born November 14, 1978 in Kazan, in the family of a military man. In 1979 the family moved to Belarus. In 2014 he graduated from the Belarusian State Academy of Arts as a director.
translation.В 2000 году окончил факультет менеджмент: In 2000 he graduated from the Faculty of Management of the Belarusian State Economic University.
translation.В 2000 году награждён медалью Министерст: In 2000 he was awarded the medal of the Ministry of Education and Science of the Russian Federation 'For the best scientific work' among young scientists following the results of an open all-Russian competition.
translation.В 2004 году защитил диссертацию кандидат: In 2004 he defended his PhD thesis in economics.
translation.белорусский телеведущий, журналист, режи: Belarusian TV presenter, journalist, director, photographer, publisher, public figure.
translation.В 1995 году окончил факультет журналисти: In 1995 he graduated from the Faculty of Journalism of the Belarusian State University.
translation.В 1996 году прошел обучение по специальн: In 1996, he completed training as a television cameraman and director at the CIRNEA International Educational Center in Paris.
translation.Олег Лукашевич стал первым белорусским ж: Oleg Lukashevich became the first Belarusian journalist accredited at the International Cannes Film Festival in May 1996
translation.белорусский фотограф и общественный деят: Belarusian photographer and public figure, Honored Worker of Culture of the Republic of Belarus (1992), teacher of the history of photography.
translation.Консультант энциклопедического справочни: Consultant of the encyclopedic reference book 'Photography'
translation.Председатель и художественный руководите: Chairman and artistic director of the 'Minsk' photo club
translation.В 1980 году окончил Белорусский технолог: In 1980 he graduated from the Belarusian Technological Institute. S. M. Kirov in Minsk.
Member of the photo club 'Evening Minsk'.
translation.Фотограф, критик, бывший председатель Со: Photographer, critic, former chairman of the Union of Photographers of Belarus, author of original methods and technologies in the field of cameraless photography.
translation.В 1990 году был создан Союз фотохудожник: In 1990, the Union of Photographers of the BSSR was created (photo club 'Minsk' since the 1960s). V. D. Lobko was elected Chairman of the Board.
translation.Председатель союза фотохудожников: Chairman of the Union of Photographers
translation.Принимал участие в основных проектах, св: Prinimal uchastiye v osnovnykh proyektakh, svyazannykh s pokazom tvorcheskoy fotografii SSSR za rubezhom v period nachinaya s nachinaya s 1973 goda. He took part in the main projects related to the display of creative photography of the USSR abroad in the period starting from 1973.
translation.Одним из главных увлечений В. Лобко стал: One of V. Lobko's main hobbies was collecting cacti. In 1984, he published in Minsk the book 'Your Green Hedgehogs', which to this day remains a reference book for numerous cactus lovers and botanists.
